title: Geir Ludvig Fevang
text:
Geir Ludvig Fevang (born 17 November 1980) is a retired <a href="Norway">Norwegian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who last played for <a href="Sandefjord%20Fotball">Sandefjord</a>. He previously played for <a href="Fevang%20FK">Fevang FK</a>, <a href="IL%20Runar">IL Runar</a>, <a href="Sandefjord%20Fotball">Sandefjord Fotball</a>, <a href="IK%20Start">IK Start</a>, <a href="K.S.C.%20Lokeren%20Oost-Vlaanderen">Lokeren</a> and <a href="FK%20Haugesund">Haugesund</a>.
Career.
Fevang came to <a href="IK%20Start">IK Start</a> in 2006, and had previously played for the clubs <a href="Sandefjord%20Fotball">Sandefjord Fotball</a>, <a href="Fevang%20FK">Fevang FK</a> and <a href="IL%20Runar">IL Runar</a>. In August 2010, he signed for the Belgian club <a href="K.S.C.%20Lokeren%20Oost-Vlaanderen">Lokeren</a>. In March 2012 he moved back to Norway, and signed for <a href="FK%20Haugesund">FK Haugesund</a>.
After three season, he moved back to his first senior club, <a href="Sandefjord%20Fotball">Sandefjord</a>, who had been promoted to the <a href="2015%20Tippeligaen">2015 Tippeligaen</a>. After the 2016 season he retired to become Sandefjord's assistant manager.
Honours.
Lokeren
